name: Blocky Block (George Pagkalis)
description:
The best Arkanoid clone ever!!! (no, not really)

Amazing Graphics!!! (no, not really)

A lot of fun!!! (well, I certainly hope you'll enjoy it!)

My first attempt at a video game. 10 levels of a classic arcade game. Enough difficulty to create a lot of frustration and scores that depend on your ability to finish off the blocks as quickly as you can. Also, a small high score list, so that you can show everyone how amazing you are at this game.
